definition: mountain pass/to close/to shut/to turn off/to concern/to involve
tight/strict/close at hand/near/urgent/tense/hard up/short of money/to tighten
important/vital/to want/to ask for/will/going to (as future auxiliary)/may/must/(used in a comparison) must be/probably/if

sentences.english: In my eyes it would be no marriage at all, but that would be nothing.
sentences.chinese: 在我後來，這根本算不上婚姻，不過這也無關緊要。

sentences.english: But size matters little when it comes to eating the crabs at the end of the safari.
sentences.chinese: 但當談到抓到以後喫螃蟹時大小並無關緊要。

sentences.english: In a resource-based economy money would become irrelevant.
sentences.chinese: 在一個資源導向經濟裏，金錢將變得無關緊要。

sentences.english: This means nothing that happens in your life is insignificant.
sentences.chinese: 這就意味着你生命裏發生的事情沒有無關緊要的。

sentences.english: It's mostly about principles -- contravening evidence and ideas don't matter too much.
sentences.chinese: 它大部分是關於原則，反駁證據和觀點是無關緊要的。

sentences.english: It doesn’t matter he’s real or not, the legend will remain.
sentences.chinese: 他是真與否，都無關緊要，傳說還是會流傳下去。

sentences.english: There is often some overlap with the Conclusions, but that's okay.
sentences.chinese: 在結論部分會有一些重疊的信息，但是這無關緊要。

sentences.english: He often remonstrated with others about unimportant matter.
sentences.chinese: 他常與別人爭辯一些無關緊要的問題。

sentences.english: But these became unnecessary in an era of floating rates.
sentences.chinese: 但是這在浮動匯率的時代就無關緊要了。

sentences.english: Our perception of the whole is not distracted by inessential details.
sentences.chinese: 我們對整體的感知並沒有被無關緊要的細節打亂。

sentences.english: Maybe it doesn’t matter to Cody or others that I am scared.
sentences.chinese: 也對於科迪和其他人來說，我害不害怕無關緊要。

sentences.english: You are always doing something marginal when the boss drops by your desk.
sentences.chinese: 你總是在做些無關緊要的事，當老闆到你的座子旁時。

sentences.english: Ina decade or so, the United States will become an irrelevancy in the PacificRim.
sentences.chinese: 未來十年左右，美國在太平洋地區將變得無關緊要。

sentences.english: They were indifferent to money, wordly possesions and pleasure.
sentences.chinese: 他們認爲錢無關緊要，說話簡單明瞭和快樂。

sentences.english: It is as if a singleunimportant event set up a chain of reactions.
sentences.chinese: 好像是一件無關緊要的小事引起了一連串的連鎖反應。

sentences.english: In brindles and solid colors a small white patch on the chest is not considered detrimental.
sentences.chinese: 虎斑色或純色在胸部有少量白色是無關緊要的。
